code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:M consultant aged 40 yrs presents with mild postural dizziness of 3 weeks duration together with mild unsteadiness, mild nausea. o:Height 192 cm, Weight 66.6 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 16 a:Dizziness p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed meclizine - 25 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

s:a m consultant aged 41 ys c/o 5 weeks h/o mild unsteadiness. NKDA. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 65.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Dizziness p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed meclizine - 25 mg daily, and ordered CBC.
